entry.title: MtGox blames bitcoin
entry.summary: The message is a request for individuals to check a thread on the Bitcointalk forum for a possible attack scenario. The author of the message has already alerted Gavin, Mike Hearn, and Adam about the situation. In response to a question about a better forum, Peter Todd recommends unsystem at lists.dyne.org for political conversations. The rest of the message includes an advertisement for the BlackBerry 10.2.1 Runtime for Android apps and information on how to get an Android app in front of a new audience.
